title: Tasty Baked Ranch Chicken Recipe
content:
Baked Ranch Chicken Recipe with step wise pictures. Delicious ranch baked chicken which tastes so delicious and is so juicy. The chicken makes a great snack.

I recently tried this and I was kind of addicted to it because it turned out to be very delicious. It was spicy and juicy and smoky, everything you want to be.

 

Baked Ranch Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 20 mins

Total time: 30 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: American

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Boneless Chicken - 300 grams

Ranch Dressing - ½ cup

Bread Crumbs - 1 cup

Italian Seasoning - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

 

Instructions

Take chicken in a bowl, add in ranch dressing and mix well. Leave to marinate for 30 mins.

Mix breadcrumbs with Italian seasoning and salt.\

Coat chicken in the breadcrumbs and arrange in a baking tray.

Preheat oven to 220 degrees C.

Bake this for 15 to 20 mins.

Remove and serve it.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Hand ( Pocket ) Pies Recipe
recommendations.content:
Super delicious chicken hand pie which is easy to make at home than buying from a shop. It will be a great appetizer or light lunch for any parties too.
 
Chicken Hand Pies Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 1 hour
Total time: 1 hour 10 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
